name: Cyno
title: "Judicator of Secrets" Cyno
desc: The card bears the General Mahamatra's ardent fondness, which reminds one of the scorching sun hanging above the desert.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Cyno to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him
